title: 【轉知】姊妹校Sultan Agung Islamic University辦理線上全球文化交流 (OGCE) ，免費名額限額五名，歡迎參加
department: 國際事務處國際合作組
author: 陳良愛
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 國際事務處國際合作組 - 陳良愛 - ice@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5107
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【轉知】姊妹校Sultan Agung Islamic University辦理線上全球文化交流 (OGCE) ，免費名額限額五名，歡迎參加
日期： Fri, 22 Sep 2023 13:29:55 +0800
附檔： Poster OGCE 2023.jpg (445 KB)   TOR - OGCE 2023.pdf (538 KB)   
This program is intended to give opportunities for students to exchange their culture, collaborate with people with different backgrounds, and build a better understanding of how they see people from different cultures. OGCE 2023 is conducted by the Department of English Literature UNISSULA in collaboration with the Office of International Affairs.

Some key aspects of the program are as follows
1. Program Period:  October 23rd - 27th, 2023 
2. Platform:  Zoom Video Meeting
3. Schedule:  Program details can be found in the TOR.
4. Registration:  To join this program, students should register directly at https://forms.gle/bm9kM13zigRWYwHG7 
5. Deadlines: The registration deadline is on OCTOBER 13th, 2023.
6. Quota: Limited only to 50 Participants.
 
Should you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us via email at sastrainggris@unissula.ac.id
You can also reach our staff on WhatsApp (Ms. Diyah) at +62 852 2950 1150.
